thread.title: Nice hotel near Eiffel Tower
thread.title_full: Nice hotel near Eiffel Tower - Review of Beaugrenelle Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KristineNJ
title: Nice hotel near Eiffel Tower
text:
The hotel is nice. The rooms are clean and a nice size. The rooms are fairly recently renovated, but the furniture a bit run down
The neighborhood is nice. Easy acces via metro to midtown, close to the Eiffel Tower, but quit. Has a market nearby on weekends, and lots of really good food shopping close by. And also a variety of nice cafe's and restaurants
